title: "greek alphabet" exhibition
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4496.png)

The deadline for submissions to the Ελληνικό Αλφάβητο exhibition has been extended until the **31st of May 2007**.

You can find more information at:  
 [http://www.ictvc.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341/http:/www.ictvc.org/ "http://www.ictvc.org")  
 [http://ea.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341/http:/ea.backpacker.gr/ "http://ea.backpacker.gr")

Submissions at:  
 [http://ea.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341/http:/ea.backpacker.gr/ "http://ea.backpacker.gr")

Questions, comments at:  
 [contact@backpacker.gr](mailto:contact@backpacker.gr)
author: gtrianta

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4115.png)

The submission process has been completed.  
We would like to thank everyone who participated.  
The participants will be informed about the results of the process via e-mail.

You can find more information at:  
 [http://ictvc.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341/http:/ictvc.org/ "http://ictvc.org")  
 [http://ea.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080341/http:/ea.backpacker.gr/ "http://ea.backpacker.gr")

Questions, comments at:  
 [contact@backpacker.gr](mailto:contact@backpacker.gr)

George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr
